tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE imaging_studies (
    study_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    study_type VARCHAR(255),
    patient_id INT,
    study_date DATE,
    image_url TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE lab_tests (
  test_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  test_name VARCHAR,
  test_result VARCHAR,
  test_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE imaging_studies (
  study_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  imaging_type VARCHAR,
  image_url VARCHAR,
  study_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE patient_care (
  care_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  care_type VARCHAR,
  care_notes TEXT,
  care_date DATE
);
CREATE TABLE LabTests (lab_test_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, test_name VARCHAR(255), test_result TEXT, test_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE ImagingStudies (imaging_study_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, study_type VARCHAR(255), study_result TEXT, study_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE PatientReports (report_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, report_type VARCHAR(255), report_content TEXT, report_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE Physicians (physician_id INT PRIMARY KEY, physician_name VARCHAR(255), specialty VARCHAR(255), experience_years INT);
CREATE TABLE Patients (patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_name VARCHAR(255), date_of_birth DATE, gender VARCHAR(10));
